system.description:
2nd degree Cutting Omen (Action)

Requirement: Unused spell slot of 1st level or higher or at least 2 unspent spell points 

You whisper fell imprecations over your weapon and ready yourself to curse your foes as you wound them.

Make a melee attack with a weapon or unarmed strike.

If the attack hits, the target is affected by a randomly-determined effect from the table below in addition to the damage done by the attack. You are aware of which effect has affected the target.

d6

  1. The target is highlighted with magical light until the beginning of your next turn.

    Attacks against the target have advantage, it has disadvantage on stealth checks, and it cannot benefit from invisibility.

  2. The target is blinded until the beginning of your next turn.

  3. The target suffers disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks and saves until the beginning of your next turn.

  4. The target suffers disadvantage on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution checks and saves until the beginning of your next turn.

  5. The target is poisoned until the beginning of your next turn.

  6. The target takes 3d4 psychic damage and is rattled until the beginning of your next turn.
